item.title: Vim is the worst text editor ever
item.description: …except you have build your own config I started my vimrc from bling/dotvim. Then I tried to find more config from some popular “Vimers”. Here’s the list: tpope/tpope Valloric/dotfiles tarruda/dot-files jasonlong/dotfiles ajh17/dotfiles romainl/dotvim jdavis/dotfiles Hope you find it useful.
